class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.PermissibleValue
class.query: select pv.value from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.PermissibleValue pv where pv.attribute = 'specimen_type' and pv.parent is null
select pv.value from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.PermissibleValue pv join pv.parent ppv where ppv.attribute = 'specimen_type' and ppv.value in (:specimenClasses)
select pv.value from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.PermissibleValue cpv join cpv.parent pv where pv.attribute = 'specimen_type' and cpv.value = :type
from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.PermissibleValue pv where pv.attribute = :attribute and pv.conceptCode = :conceptCode
from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.PermissibleValue pv where pv.attribute = :attribute and pv.value = :value
from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.PermissibleValue pv join pv.props props where pv.attribute = :attribute and index(props) = :key and :value in elements(props)
